Html:
Hi guys, this might be a stupid question (probably it is) but i really can't figure out how to retrieve the form field of a message. I'm able to get the recievers (to, cc and bcc) but i don't understand how to get the sender of the message!
Can you please help me?
Thanks
ok i solved following documentation at this page https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/office/cc815517.aspx where all properties are enumerated with their id!
